title: Biotransport
description: Fundamental principles of fluid, heat, and mass transfer with particular emphasis on physiological and biomedical systems. Credit will not be awarded for both BMED 3310 and BMED 3300.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BMED 2210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2231 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
